Class MP3header

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--MP3header
public class MP3header
extends java.lang.Object

Captures the information from the first MPEG frame in a file, if present.

Version:
1.1 - September 30, 1999
Author:
C. Vickery

Constructor Summary

Constructor Detail

MP3header

public MP3header(java.io.File f)
          throws InvalidMPEG_HeaderException
Given a File, find the first MPEG frame, then extract and interpret the information encoded in the frame's header.
Parameters:
f - The file to be examined.
Throws:
InvalidMPEG_HeaderException - if the file cannot be read or if the MPEG header sync. pattern (11 binary 1s starting on a byte boundary) cannot be found.
